title: Acid Splash

Conjuration Cantrip

Throw a bubble of acid that damages each creature it hits.

Acid Splash is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Acid Splash is a Cantrip from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 Acid Splash Information

Description: Throw a bubble of acid that damages each creature it hits. Level: Cantrip School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Dexterity Spellcasting Ability: Intelligence

How to Acquire Acid Splash in Baldur's Gate3

Acid Splash can be acquired by the following classes:

Sorcerer, Wizard, Eldritch Knight
